Back when CS:GO first came out there were a lot of community servers which made it fun like CS:S. Over time, the game shifted its focus on the competitive scene. I was lucky to have a group of friends to play competitive with, which made it enjoyable. If you have a group of friends to play with, I definitely recommend it. I'm not sure what the community servers look like now, but since CS:GO is free-to-play now, it's worth it to see if you'll like it.
